Description: Water vessel made of pottery; undecorated red ware.
Curator's comments: Register: "Water pot used by the monks of St Antony on the north slopes of South Gralala Mountains, Red Sea Coast, 40 km from Zafarara light house; usually slung from shoulder with a palm rope".
Acquisition name: Donated by: J E M Mellor
Acquisition notes: Af1930,1105.1 to 20 were given by the entomologist J E M Mellor, who had collected them in Egypt where he worked from 1924-30. The registers records his notes on the find spots and usage of the objects.
